import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiMercadoLivreService } from '../services/api-mercado-livre.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { Itens } from '../models/itens'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu.component.css'] }) export class MenuComponent { inputValue: string = "" itens: Itens[] = []; constructor(private apiML : ApiMercadoLivreService){} onInputChange() { this.inputValue = ($event.target as HTMLInputElement).value; } getItens(): void { this.apiML.getItens(this.inputValue).subscribe( (result) => { this.itens = result; }, (error) => { console.log(error); } ); } search(event: any): void { this.inputValue = event.target.value; this.getItens(); } }
